questions.quote: Alright, two hundred, but that's as high as I can go. I really think you're being unreasonable here!
Look Hubert. It's the mailman. You remember the mailman don't you.
See, there you go again. What is the difference what I think?
I wonder how Susan's father's going to react to this. Alright, what- what's the worst he could do? So you burn a cabin down..
Kramer, listen to me. Listen! This is a once in a lifetime opportunity. Â Your dreams have been shattered, somebody's got to be held accountable. Come on, we'll take for every penny she's got!
I didn't tell you to have a hot dog. Who told you to have a hot dog?
All right . . . . I once found a hair in my Farina and I freaked out.
Alright. Next thing on the agenda, the restoration of the fence at the Briarwood gate. At the present time, we are still accepting bids.
Yeah, I know, but... "Moland"? I wouldn't drink anything called "Moland".
I think you're getting a little pudding under the skin yourself.
